original_text: From Attalia they sailed back to Antioch, where they had been committed to the grace of God for the work they had now completed.
korean_text: 거기서 배 타고 안디옥에 이르니 이 곳은 두 사도가 이룬 그 일을 위하여 전에 하나님의 은혜에 부탁하던 곳이라

sentences.original_text: From Attalia they sailed back to Antioch
where they had been committed to the grace of God
for the work they had now completed
